text: Pavement was an indie rock band from California, United States. They made music from 1989 until 1999. They were on the music label Matador Records. == Albums == Slanted & Enchanted (1993) Crooked Rain, Crooked Rain (1994) Wowee Zowee (1995) Brighten The Corners (1997) Terror Twilight (1999) Category:American rock bands Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups from California
title: Pavement (band)
